title: Still Open All Hours 2014 S01E03 HDTV x264 - GHOST DOG
description:
Still Open All Hours is a spin off from the popular Open All Hours series. Granville has now inherited the shop from his Uncle Arkwright. He runs it with his son Leroy who has more female admirers than he ever had. 

Episode 3 of 6:

David Jason returns as Granville, who has inherited the famous corner shop from his beloved but miserly uncle Arkwright. Now running the business with his cheerful and good-looking son Leroy, Granville continues to serve the local community with a keen eye on a profit from some familiar and new faces.

Romance is in the air as Granville continues to woo Mavis, Gastric needs more help with his love life and Leroy arouses jealousy.
Meanwhile, Cyril is tempted by the latest workout craze, and Granville reveals his tip for preserving bacon.
